subject: Travel
title: Holi: The Festival of Colors
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Holi: The Festival of Colors.

hook.text: Once a year, India erupts in color. Strangers throw powdered dye at each other and nobody gets angry.

buildup.text: Holi celebrates the triumph of good over evil and the arrival of spring across Hindu traditions.

discovery.text: The colors originally came from medicinal herbs. Turmeric, neem, and kumkum improved skin health.

twist.text: During Holi, social barriers dissolve. Rich and poor, young and old throw colors at each other equally.

climax.text: The night before, communities light bonfires to burn away evil. The ashes are considered sacred.

punchline.text: One festival erases every social line with color.

quiz.question: What did the original Holi colors come from?
options: Medicinal herbs like turmeric and neem
